categoryDescription: Battery Health is a measure of the battery's ability to hold a charge. A battery with a high health rating is able to hold a charge for a longer period of time.
Budget friendly mobile phones are those that are priced as low. These phones are ideal for those who are looking for a phone that is affordable and has all the basic features.
Like new mobile phones are those that are in excellent condition. These phones are ideal for those who are looking for a phone that is in excellent condition and has all the basic features.
